verbs.description: [ARG1: A group of governors] [V: banded] [ARGM-PRD: together] [ARGM-PRP: to protest President Trump 's " zero tolerance " immigration policy] [ARGM-TMP: as the uproar over the separation of migrant children from their parents continues across the nation] .

[ARG0: A group of governors] banded together to [V: protest] [ARG1: President Trump 's " zero tolerance " immigration policy] as the uproar over the separation of migrant children from their parents continues across the nation .
